name: Shrooms And Slimes
description:
Shrooms and slimes is a pixel art indie game about killing shrooms and slaying slimes, The game has tons of fun mechanics and a multiplayer system so you can party up with your friends. We have 6 different monsters and bosses and over 14 different skins so you'll never get bored. So join us in the world of Shrooms and Slimes!

Join our discord for more updates! https://discord.gg/T2T5KMV8gx
